topic: Simple Questions: 什么? 谁? 哪里?
detailedSummary: Simple question words in Chinese: Shén me? (What?), Shéi? (Who?), Nǎ lǐ? (Where?), Shén me shí hou? (When?), Wèi shén me? (Why?), Zěn me? (How?).
whyItMatters: Mastering Simple Questions: 什么? 谁? 哪里? is essential for building a strong foundation in chinese - these basic concepts are the first building blocks for all future language learning.
